html: مبروك بالفوز لكأس العالم @FIFAeWorldCup #MSDossary Congrats on winning the #FIFAeWorldcup, #MSDossary. Would have loved to congratulate you personally and handover the trophy. I hope I can learn from you some day personally! Take care and enjoy your victory.pic.twitter.com/AZQWOElzl6
text:
مبروك بالفوز لكأس العالم @FIFAeWorldCup #MSDossary
Congrats on winning the #FIFAeWorldcup, #MSDossary. 
Would have loved to congratulate you personally and handover the trophy.  I hope I can learn from you some day personally!  Take care and enjoy your victory.pic.twitter.com/AZQWOElzl6

html: From a footballing point of view the WC was a huge disappointment. Nevertheless I am very happy Big Shoe and I were able to assist children with bad heart defects to the best possible treatment in #Rus Thx to the whole team around heart surgeon Prof. Vogt #EurasiaHeartpic.twitter.com/Makg4v1Z8M
text: From a footballing point of view the WC was a huge disappointment. Nevertheless I am very happy Big Shoe and I were able to assist children with bad heart defects to the best possible treatment in #Rus  Thx to the whole team around heart surgeon Prof. Vogt #EurasiaHeartpic.twitter.com/Makg4v1Z8M
